basic.description: This course is for students registered at a university outside Canada who wish to do a term at Queen's to satisfy the requirements of their home university. The student will work with a professor who has agreed to act as a supervisor. The time frame and requirements for course completion will be agreed upon by the supervising professor at Queen's, and a faculty member of the university for which the student is fulfilling the work term requirement.
basic.subject: MECH
basic.title: Eng Proj For Intl Students

extra.enrollment_requirement: Must be registered in a BSCE program
